text.text: Multiple 2D/3D Game Collection All 1980/20xx All supports Light gun, Wiimote, Gamepad

text.name: sys_description
text.text: Originally, the light gun would use light to determine whether or not a shot was registered in game on your CRT display, however over time this term has come to refer to all games which use a gun-like peripheral to aim at in-game targets. Notable retro light gun games include Duck Hunt, House of the Dead, Virtua Cop and Time Crisis. However, in the late 90s light gun games began to drop in popularity. The Wii revived the genre in the mid 2000s with its IR-tracked Wiimote allowing for games such as R.E. Dark Side Chronicles, Dead Space Extraction, Ghost Squad and Target Terror.
